creator: samangal@cisco.com
text:
Created attachment 31962
log4j.xml

I tried to implement automatic reconfiguration on a web(Tomcat) as well as console application, but it was not working.

Please find my attachment log4j2.xml


I was trying to change the level but it was not reflecting.

I tried with 

log4j-api/core-2.0.beta9.jar / 2.0.2 version too

creator: Ralph.Goers@dslextreme.com
text: Bugzilla is used for log4j 1.x issues. If you are having a problem with Log4j 2 you need to create an issue in Jira.
